snippet: The Federal Trade Commission is investigating Google’s policies around licensing certain patents and suing other companies that it claims infringe on them.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission is investigating Google's polices on patents that apply to lucrative smartphone technology, specifically the licensing of those patents and lawsuits against other companies that infringe on them.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission is investigating Google’s policies around licensing certain patents and suing other companies that it claims infringe on them.

headline.main: Widening Scrutiny of Google’s Smartphone Patents
headline.print_headline: Widening Scrutiny of Google’s Smartphone Patents
